name: Mojo
description: "Mojo” is a new version of the famous game “2048”, an original approach to this well-known puzzle. Several beautiful girls will keep you company during the game. The more points you get, the less clothes remain on the girls.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1000 MHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Hardware support WebGL - OpenGL 2.1 (GPU Memory - 512MB) Storage: 123 MB available space
